statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_data;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM attendance_data WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, attendance_count FROM attendance_data ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM attendance_data;
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM attendance_data WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM attendance_data WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendance_data ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM attendance_data WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM attendance_data WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(event_id) AS total_events, SUM(attendance_count) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_data;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, start_time FROM virtual_lectures WHERE lecturer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_name, lecturer_name, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_lectures ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM virtual_lectures WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT lecture_id, attendance_status, participation_points FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 12345;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM virtual_lectures WHERE lecture_name='Math101';
SELECT lecture_name, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_lectures WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_lectures ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, COUNT(lecture_id) AS total_lectures FROM virtual_lectures GROUP BY lecture_name, lecturer_name;
SELECT lecture_name, COUNT(DISTINCT lecturer_name) AS total_lecturers FROM virtual_lectures GROUP BY lecture_name;
SELECT * FROM LectureAttendees;
SELECT lecture_id, student_id FROM LectureAttendees WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT topic_name FROM LectureTopics ORDER BY topic_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WebinarAttendees WHERE join_time < '2023-01-01' AND leave_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT webinar_id, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM WebinarAttendees GROUP BY webinar_id;
SELECT * FROM LectureAttendees
SELECT lecture_id, student_id, attendance_status FROM LectureAttendees ORDER BY lecture_id DESC
SELECT lecture_id, student_id, participation_score FROM LectureAttendees WHERE participation_score > 80
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM LectureTopics
SELECT * FROM WebinarAttendees ORDER BY join_time ASC
SELECT * FROM Lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date, presenter_name FROM Lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT lecturer_id, lecture_title, participants_count FROM Lectures WHERE participants_count > 50;
SELECT presenter_name, COUNT(*) AS webinar_count FROM Webinars GROUP BY presenter_name;
SELECT p.participant_name, a.attendance_status FROM Participants p JOIN Attendance a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id WHERE a.attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_title, lecture_date, presenter_name, participants_count FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT presenter_name, COUNT(*) AS webinar_count FROM Webinars GROUP BY presenter_name ORDER BY webinar_count DESC;
SELECT participant_name, email_address, organization_name FROM Participants WHERE organization_name = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' AND check_in_time > '2022-09-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT L.lecture_title, W.webinar_topic, P.participant_name FROM Lectures L JOIN Webinars W ON L.presenter_name = W.presenter_name JOIN Participants P ON L.lecture_id = P.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lecture_attendance;
SELECT participant_name, attendance_status FROM virtual_lecture_attendance ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, lecture_id, attendance_status FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT participant_name, webinar_id, participation_score FROM webinar_participation WHERE participation_score > 50 ORDER BY participation_score DESC;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM participant_profiles WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, attendance_status FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT feedback_id, lecture_id, participant_id, rating FROM lecture_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT webinar_id, participant_name, participation_score FROM webinar_participation WHERE participation_score >= 80;
SELECT p.participant_name, w.participant_name, w.rating FROM webinar_feedback w JOIN participant_profiles p ON w.participant_id = p.participant_id;
SELECT participant_name, email, registration_date FROM participant_profiles WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
